Title: Revenge of the Slitheen (1)
Plot: It's Maria (Yasmine Paige), Luke (Tommy Knight) and Clyde's (David Anthony) first day at their new school ? and something's not quite right. The food keeps going off, there's a funny smell in the air and the new technology block is hiding some dark secrets. The friends soon make a shocking discovery: evil alien race the Slitheen have disguised themselves as teachers as part of a deadly plan that threatens the future of the entire Earth.
GuestStars: Joseph Millson, Juliet Cowan, Martyn Ellis, Ian Midlane, Pamela Merrick, Imogen Bain, Anton Thompson McCormick, Jimmy Vee, Paul Kasey, Lachele Carl
